You can control her movement direction during this state, and you can end it prematurely by using this skill again.<br>When this high-speed state ends, Lynette will unleash her Enigma Thrust. If there is an opponent with Shadowsign applied to them nearby, Lynette will approach them in a flash before using Enigma Thrust.<br><br>A maximum of 1 opponent can have Shadowsign at any one time. When this opponent gets too far from Lynette, the Shadowsign will be canceled.<br><br>'''Arkhe: Ousia'''<br>At specific intervals, Lynette will unleash a Surging Blade when she uses Enigma Thrust, dealing [[Ousia]]-aligned {{Color|Anemo DMG}}.

{{Description|"Now then, turn your eyes to the stage and continue to enjoy the performance. When I next appear, I'll be where you least expect."}}
'''Enigmatic Feint''' is [[Lynette]]'s [[Elemental Skill]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{Talent Note|cooldown|delayed|the Pilfering Shadow state|hold}}
* {{Talent Note|particles|Enigma Thrust DMG|4}}
* The skill button does not need to remain pressed once the hold version of this skill triggers (takes about 1 second).
* The Pilfering Shadow state can be exited with a dash, with a jump, by pressing the Normal Attack button, by pressing the Elemental Skill button again, or by waiting for the state to reach its maximum duration. The first two options will not trigger the Enigma Thrust, but the last three options will.
:<gallery>
Talent Enigmatic Feint 2.png|Exit Pilfering Shadow State Icon
</gallery>
